subject: Re: CIRCA94 x Rock Stone - Whitelabelled Website Brief + Quote Request
preview: Hi Dimitri,  Confirming we have updated the contact form. https://rockstone.au/#contact

full_threads.body:
Hi Dimitri,

Confirming we have updated the contact form.
https://rockstone.au/#contact

action.text: Victoria Victoria assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hey Joel,

Thanks for this - here's the script to update the enquiry forms so it drives directly to HubSpot:

<script charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" src="//js-ap1.hsforms.net/forms/embed/v2.js"></script>
<script>
hbspt.forms.create({
portalId: "441883148",
formId: "3f54bd80-3f8a-4dc4-a128-0a4830a627f0",
region: "ap1"
});
</script>

Once that's implemented, should be good to close out!

Thanks,

Dimitri

Dimitri Petrou

Managing Director

32 York Street, Sydney NSW 2000

+61 414 512 345

circa94.com.au

Hi Dimitri,

Thanks again for the quick call earlier!

We noticed something off with the front page data, so we went ahead and created a fresh version for you to review:
https://rockstone.au/home/

Once you're happy with this version, we’ll apply it to the live front page.

Let me know if you spot anything or need any changes, happy to help!
@joel - meeting Dimitri on Monday at 1030am.

Hey Team,

V3 (final included round of revisions) have been attached, also added in the files referred to into your Google Drive:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1n63GmuC8biB5bjDboYJPRjhJceM9h7wc

Let me know if you need anything else from my/client end!

Thanks,

Dimitri

Hi Dimitri.

We have completed almost all of the items in the PDF.

We only need the following files for these pages:
Images:
  • https://rockstone.au/product/rock-stud-adhesive/
  • https://rockstone.au/product/rock-base-jointing-compound/

PDF:
  • https://rockstone.au/product/acoustic-panels/


I'd also would like to confirm since we have hidden some products in homepage, shall we also remove them temporarily from the Product menu dropdown?

Feel free to review our updates and let us know if there's anything else that we can help you with.
